text: Jason Beghe filed for divorce from his wife of 17 years on Thursday, citing'irreconcilable differences,'according to The Blast. The 57 - year - old Chicago PD star married actress Angie Janu in 2000 and the pair share two children, 14 - year - old Bix and 11 - year - old Bo. Beghe notes in his filing that he will pay spousal support to his estranged partner, but wishes to keep some assets he inherited out of the divorce proceedings.
